Spaghetti Carbonara.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
Spaghetti Carbonara.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Whisk eggs and Parmesan. Sauté pancetta. Combine everything and serve.

Chocolate Chip Cookies.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Chocolate Chip Cookies.instructions: Mix ingredients. Scoop dough onto a baking sheet. Bake at 350°F for 10-12 minutes.

Chicken Tikka Masala.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
Chicken Tikka Masala.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook in a tomato-based sauce. Serve with rice.

Avocado Toast.title: Avocado Toast
Avocado Toast.instructions: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread on toast.

Classic Pancakes.title: Classic Pancakes
Classic Pancakes.instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour batter onto a hot griddle. Flip when bubbles form. Serve warm.

Margherita Pizza.title: Margherita Pizza
Margherita Pizza.instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough. Add mozzarella and basil. Bake at 475°F for 10-15 minutes.

Beef Stroganoff.title: Beef Stroganoff
Beef Stroganoff.instructions: Sauté beef and mushrooms. Add onions and garlic. Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles.

Vegetable Stir-Fry.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Vegetable Stir-Fry.instructions: Sauté vegetables with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce and stir-fry until tender.

French Onion Soup.title: French Onion Soup
French Onion Soup.instructions: Caramelize onions. Add broth and thyme. Serve with toasted baguette and melted cheese.

Lemon Garlic Salmon.title: Lemon Garlic Salmon
Lemon Garlic Salmon.instructions: Season salmon with lemon juice and garlic. Bake at 400°F for 12-15 minutes.

Banana Bread.title: Banana Bread
Banana Bread.instructions: Mash bananas. Mix with other ingredients. Pour into a loaf pan and bake at 350°F for 50-60 minutes.

Tomato Basil Soup.title: Tomato Basil Soup
Tomato Basil Soup.instructions: Sauté garlic and onion. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer, then blend until smooth. Stir in basil and serve.

Shrimp Scampi.title: Shrimp Scampi
Shrimp Scampi.instructions: Sauté garlic in butter. Add shrimp, lemon juice, and wine. Serve over cooked spaghetti with parsley.

Stuffed Bell Peppers.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Stuffed Bell Peppers.instructions: Cook beef and rice. Mix with tomato sauce and seasonings. Stuff into bell peppers and bake at 375°F for 30 minutes.

Eggplant Parmesan.title: Eggplant Parmesan
Eggplant Parmesan.instructions: Slice and bread eggplant. Fry until golden. Layer with sauce and cheese, then bake at 375°F for 25 minutes.

Teriyaki Chicken.title: Teriyaki Chicken
Teriyaki Chicken.instructions: Marinate chicken in soy sauce, sugar, garlic, and ginger. Cook until caramelized. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.

Greek Salad.title: Greek Salad
Greek Salad.instructions: Chop vegetables. Toss with feta, olives, and olive oil. Sprinkle with oregano and serve.

Pumpkin Pie.title: Pumpkin Pie
Pumpkin Pie.instructions: Mix ingredients. Pour into pie crust. Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.

Garlic Butter Steak.title: Garlic Butter Steak
Garlic Butter Steak.instructions: Season steak. Sear in a hot pan with butter and garlic. Finish with rosemary and serve.

Mango Smoothie.title: Mango Smoothie
Mango Smoothie.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.
